Translations.Text: Divortium retracted twice divortium femina allowed vivens in same domus amicably sinister it amicably! Non est lawful maritus take anything he dedit eam. couple fear ut they transgress deus juris. ibi est fear they transgress deus juris they commit nullus erratum uxor willingly dedit whatever she chooses These est deus juris; non transgress them. Those transgress deus juris est the unjust

he divortium eam (pro 3 temporis est unlawful eum remarry eam unless she maritus alias vir tunc he divortium eam! Primus conjux tunc remarry eam long prout they observe deus juris! These est deus juris; He explains them people qui know)

Vos divortium femina dodum they fulfill their interim (3 menstruations) vos allow them vivens in same domus amicably let them sinister amicably! Non force them stay contra their testimentum prout revenge Anyone perfecit hoc wrongs his suus anima. Non take deus revelations in vain Remember deus blessings vos He sent down vos scripture wisdom enlighten vos. Vos observe DEUS know ut DEUS est aware de totus things
